Spanish: Suspirar es una forma de liberar el estrés.
English: Sighing is a way to release stress.

Spanish: Los sueños pueden sonar muy reales.
English: Dreams can sound very real.

Spanish: Insistir en la puntualidad es importante en el trabajo.
English: Insisting on punctuality is important in the workplace.

Spanish: Me gusta vagar por el parque los domingos.
English: I like to wander around the park on Sundays.

Spanish: Matar el tiempo con juegos de mesa es divertido.
English: Killing time with board games is fun.

Spanish: Cuento con mi mejor amigo para apoyarme en los momentos difíciles.
English: I rely on my best friend to support me in tough times.

Spanish: Opino que la educación es fundamental para el desarrollo personal.
English: I believe that education is fundamental for personal development.

Spanish: A algunas personas les importa mucho su apariencia física.
English: Some people care a lot about their physical appearance.

Spanish: Es importante retener la información clave durante el estudio.
English: It's important to retain key information during studying.

Spanish: No está bien pegar a los demás, es importante resolver los conflictos de manera pacífica.
English: It's not okay to hit others, it's important to resolve conflicts peacefully.

Spanish: Los niños suelen saltar de alegría cuando reciben regalos.
English: Children often jump for joy when they receive gifts.

Spanish: Estar en forma es importante para la salud.
English: Being in shape is important for health.

Spanish: Se van a casar el próximo verano en la playa.
English: They are getting married next summer on the beach.

Spanish: No deberías ignorar los consejos de tus padres.
English: You shouldn't ignore your parents' advice.

Spanish: El azúcar se disuelve fácilmente en el agua caliente.
English: Sugar dissolves easily in hot water.

Spanish: Me enojo cuando la gente no cumple sus promesas.
English: I get angry when people don't keep their promises.

Spanish: A veces, en el otoño, suele lloviznar.
English: Sometimes, in the fall, it tends to drizzle.

Spanish: Después de muchos años juntos, decidieron divorciarse.
English: After many years together, they decided to get divorced.

Spanish: Gozo de la compañía de mis amigos en las reuniones.
English: I enjoy the company of my friends at gatherings.

Spanish: La naturaleza suele inspirar a los artistas.
English: Nature often inspires artists.

Spanish: Lograr el éxito requiere esfuerzo y dedicación.
English: Achieving success requires effort and dedication.

Spanish: Diseñar una casa sostenible es un desafío emocionante.
English: Designing a sustainable house is an exciting challenge.

Spanish: Captar la atención del público es fundamental para una buena presentación.
English: Capturing the audience's attention is crucial for a good presentation.

Spanish: Emborracharse no es una solución a los problemas.
English: Getting drunk is not a solution to problems.

Spanish: Freír papas en casa siempre deja un delicioso aroma.
English: Frying potatoes at home always leaves a delicious aroma.

Spanish: Añadir sal y pimienta al gusto para sazonar la comida.
English: Add salt and pepper to taste to season the food.

Spanish: Anular el contrato requerirá la aprobación de ambas partes.
English: Nullifying the contract will require approval from both parties.

Spanish: Prohibir el acceso a ciertas áreas protege la seguridad de todos.
English: Prohibiting access to certain areas protects everyone's safety.

Spanish: Asistir a la conferencia me brindó nuevas perspectivas sobre el tema.
English: Attending the conference gave me new perspectives on the topic.

Spanish: Lavarse las manos es esencial para prevenir enfermedades.
English: Washing hands is essential to prevent illnesses.

Spanish: Interrumpir constantemente a los demás es una falta de respeto.
English: Constantly interrupting others is disrespectful.

Spanish: Esconderse debajo de la cama no resolverá el problema.
English: Hiding under the bed will not solve the problem.

Spanish: Llevar una vida saludable implica hacer ejercicio regularmente.
English: Leading a healthy life involves exercising regularly.

Spanish: Aparecer en la reunión a tiempo muestra compromiso y responsabilidad.
English: Showing up to the meeting on time shows commitment and responsibility.

Spanish: Recuperarse de una enfermedad requiere descanso y paciencia.
English: Recovering from an illness requires rest and patience.

Spanish: Engañarse a uno mismo solo prolongará la situación difícil.
English: Deceiving oneself will only prolong the difficult situation.

Spanish: Pintar un mural en la pared transformó por completo el espacio.
English: Painting a mural on the wall completely transformed the space.

Spanish: Pasear por el parque siempre me relaja después de un día agitado.
English: Taking a walk in the park always relaxes me after a hectic day.

Spanish: Tirar la basura en su lugar ayuda a mantener limpio el entorno.
English: Throwing the trash in its place helps keep the environment clean.

Spanish: Torcer el tobillo puede causar molestias y dificultades para caminar.
English: Twisting the ankle can cause discomfort and difficulty walking.

Spanish: Se encontraron en el parque después de mucho tiempo.
English: They met in the park after a long time.

Spanish: Advertí a mi amigo sobre los peligros de la carretera.
English: I warned my friend about the dangers of the road.

Spanish: ¿Qué piensas de la nueva película de terror?
English: What do you think of the new horror movie?

Spanish: Cierra la puerta antes de salir, por favor.
English: Close the door before you leave, please.

Spanish: Los pájaros pueden volar a grandes alturas.
English: Birds can fly at great heights.

Spanish: Me imagino viviendo en una casa frente al mar.
English: I imagine myself living in a house by the sea.

Spanish: Realizó su sueño de viajar por todo el mundo.
English: He fulfilled his dream of traveling around the world.

Spanish: Sufrió una lesión en el partido de fútbol.
English: He suffered an injury in the soccer game.

Spanish: Colocó las llaves en la mesa de la entrada.
English: She placed the keys on the entryway table.

Spanish: Va a llover esta tarde, así que lleva un paraguas.
English: It's going to rain this afternoon, so bring an umbrella.

Spanish: No entiendo por qué actuó de esa manera.
English: I don't understand why he acted that way.

Spanish: Me gusta el sabor del chocolate amargo.
English: I like the taste of dark chocolate.

Spanish: Le toca a Juan organizar la fiesta de cumpleaños.
English: It's Juan's turn to organize the birthday party.

Spanish: Me acuerdo de nuestra primera cita como si fuera ayer.
English: I remember our first date as if it were yesterday.

Spanish: Siento tristeza por la pérdida de mi mascota.
English: I feel sadness for the loss of my pet.

Spanish: El sol calienta la tierra después de la lluvia.
English: The sun warms the earth after the rain.

Spanish: No puedes estacionar en esta zona, es prohibido.
English: You can't park in this area, it's prohibited.

Spanish: Me pregunto si llegaré a tiempo para la reunión.
English: I wonder if I will arrive on time for the meeting.

Spanish: Imagina un mundo sin fronteras ni barreras.
English: Imagine a world without borders or barriers.

Spanish: Fundaron una organización benéfica para ayudar a los necesitados.
English: They founded a charity organization to help those in need.

Spanish: Prender la luz antes de entrar a la habitación.
English: Turn on the light before entering the room.

Spanish: Averiguar la dirección antes de salir de casa.
English: Find out the address before leaving home.

Spanish: No te metas en problemas ajenos.
English: Don't get involved in other people's problems.

Spanish: No te preocupes, todo saldrá bien.
English: Don't worry, everything will be fine.

Spanish: Si no estudias, te morirás de hambre.
English: If you don't study, you will starve.

Spanish: Entregar la tarea a tiempo es importante.
English: Handing in the assignment on time is important.

Spanish: No quiero molestar a nadie, solo necesito un momento de silencio.
English: I don't want to bother anyone, I just need a moment of silence.

Spanish: Voy a alquilar una película para ver esta noche.
English: I'm going to rent a movie to watch tonight.

Spanish: Es fácil lesionarse si no se tiene cuidado al practicar deportes.
English: It's easy to get injured if you're not careful when playing sports.

Spanish: Ten cuidado de no caerte en el hielo.
English: Be careful not to slip on the ice.

Spanish: Es hora de despedirse y volver a casa.
English: It's time to say goodbye and go back home.

Spanish: No deberías besar a alguien sin su consentimiento.
English: You shouldn't kiss someone without their consent.

Spanish: Espero encontrarte pronto para hablar.
English: I hope to find you soon to talk.

Spanish: Es importante expresarse claramente para evitar malentendidos.
English: It's important to express oneself clearly to avoid misunderstandings.

Spanish: Arrancar el coche en invierno puede ser difícil.
English: Starting the car in winter can be difficult.

Spanish: No debes botar la basura en la calle.
English: You shouldn't throw garbage on the street.

Spanish: El color rojo en este contexto significa peligro.
English: The color red in this context means danger.

Spanish: No temas pedir ayuda si la necesitas.
English: Don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it.

Spanish: He decidido estudiar en el extranjero el próximo año.
English: I have decided to study abroad next year.

Spanish: Por favor, explíquense claramente para que todos entiendan.
English: Please explain yourselves clearly so that everyone understands.

Spanish: El juez concedió la libertad condicional al acusado.
English: The judge granted parole to the defendant.

Spanish: Ella escribió una carta de agradecimiento a su jefe.
English: She wrote a thank-you letter to her boss.

Spanish: ¿Puedo pedir un favor?
English: Can I ask for a favor?

Spanish: El comerciante decidió vender su negocio.
English: The merchant decided to sell his business.

Spanish: Vamos a festejar el cumpleaños de mi hermana en un restaurante.
English: We are going to celebrate my sister's birthday at a restaurant.

Spanish: Siempre extraño a mi familia cuando estoy lejos.
English: I always miss my family when I am away.

Spanish: Los turistas van a subir la montaña más alta de la región.
English: The tourists are going to climb the highest mountain in the region.

Spanish: Ella decidió regalarle flores a su madre.
English: She decided to give flowers to her mother.

Spanish: El camarero va a servir la cena en unos minutos.
English: The waiter is going to serve dinner in a few minutes.

Spanish: ¿Me puedes prestar tu libro de matemáticas?
English: Can you lend me your math book?

Spanish: El globo se empezó a hincharse cuando lo inflamos.
English: The balloon started to swell when we inflated it.

Spanish: Voy a apostar por el equipo local en el partido de fútbol.
English: I am going to bet on the local team in the soccer match.

Spanish: ¿Puedes contar cuántas personas asistirán a la reunión?
English: Can you count how many people will attend the meeting?

Spanish: Añoro los días de verano en la playa.
English: I yearn for the summer days at the beach.

Spanish: Vamos a ir al cine esta noche.
English: We are going to go to the movies tonight.

Spanish: Los niños van a jugar en el parque después de la escuela.
English: The children are going to play in the park after school.

Spanish: El presidente va a firmar el tratado internacional mañana.
English: The president is going to sign the international treaty tomorrow.

Spanish: Espero que aprueben mi propuesta en la reunión.
English: I hope they approve my proposal at the meeting.

Spanish: Decidieron quedarse en casa durante las vacaciones.
English: They decided to stay at home during the holidays.

Spanish: Me siento feliz cuando estoy con mis amigos.
English: I feel happy when I am with my friends.
